channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Amazon Prime Video’ Best New Show Lands A Perfect 100% Critic Score
item.description: The best new show to hit Amazon Prime Video in a while has arrived with perfect scores from critics, and everyone should check it out.

item.title: Embracing the Rotten Tomato gap
item.description: The site gives movies two scores on a scale from 1 to 100: One is from critics, and the other is from typical viewers who are taking the time to chime...

item.title: Google’s New Android Update — 3 Things Your Phone Can No Longer Do
item.description: This new Google Android update stops smartphone users from doing three things — here’s what they are and why it matters.

item.title: Apple Issues New App Store Warning—Here’s What It Means
item.description: Apple has started placing warnings on its App Store, in the form of an exclamation point. Here's what it means.

item.title: Shifting B2B Pricing From The Static To The Strategic

item.title: Apple Goes Beyond “Reasonable Accommodation” With Inclusive Tech
item.description: Apple’s accessibility update redefines inclusion—shifting from accommodation to empowerment with tools like Magnifier for Mac and Live Captions on App...

item.title: Effort and value
item.description: We expend effort. We create value. It’s easy to get confused about which one we’re going to ultimately be compensated for.

item.title: Infinity is not a number

item.title: Activation is not a secret
